English: Slow and steady wins the race
Yoruba: Sùúrù lérè
Igbo: Ngwaya ngwaya ka a na-arị elu

English: As you sow, so shall you reap
Yoruba: Ohun tí o bá gbìn ni wàá ká
Hausa: Abin da ka shuka, shi zaka girba

English: Make hay while the sun shines
Yoruba: Ṣiṣẹ́ nígbà tí oòrùn bá ń ràn
Hausa: Yi aiki sa'ilin da rana take haske

English: Many hands make light work
Yoruba: Ọwọ́ púpọ̀ ní ń mú iṣẹ́ fúyẹ́
Hausa: Hannu da yawa suke sa aiki ya yi sauƙi

English: A bird in hand is worth two in the bush
Yoruba: Adìẹ ìrànà ní ń ṣáájú òkú
Hausa: Gwara guda a hannu da biyu a daji

English: Patience is a virtue
Yoruba: Onísùúrù ní ń jẹun gbeṣẹ
Igbo: Onye nwere ndidi na-eri azụ n'ụzọ

English: United we stand, divided we fall
Yoruba: Àjọjẹ kò dùn bí ẹnìkan kò bá ní

English: Experience is the best teacher
Yoruba: Ìrírí ni olùkọ́ tó dára jù lọ
Igbo: Ahụmịhe bụ onye nkuzi kachasị mma

English: What goes up must come down
Yoruba: Ohun tó bá gòkè yóò bọ̀
Hausa: Abin da ya hau zai sauka

English: Pride goes before a fall
Yoruba: Ìgbéraga ní ń ṣáájú ìparun

English: Look before you leap
Yoruba: Wòran kí o tó bẹ́ sínú igbó
Hausa: A yi shawara kafin a fara aiki

English: When in Rome, do as the Romans do
Yoruba: Ìlú tí a bá dé ni a ń tẹ̀lé òfin rẹ̀
Hausa: Shiga gari ya fi shiga daji
Igbo: Ebe onye bi ka ọ na-awachi

English: Where there is a will, there is a way
Yoruba: Bí ọkàn bá fẹ́, ọ̀nà yóò là

English: Honesty is the best policy
Yoruba: Òtítọ́ inú ni òògùn ìṣẹ́

English: A stitch in time saves nine
Yoruba: Ṣíṣe nǹkan lásìkò ń dènà ìbàjẹ́

English: From little acorns, great oaks grow
Yoruba: Ìbẹ̀rẹ̀ kò kọ́mọ

English: Don't count your chickens before they hatch
Yoruba: Má ṣe kàkà kí adìẹ tó pamọ́
Hausa: Kada ka lissafa kaza kafin ta kyankyashe
Igbo: Agụla nwa ọkụkọ tupu ọ pụta

English: Prevention is better than cure
Yoruba: Ìdènà sàn ju ìwòsàn lọ
Igbo: Imechi ụzọ tupu ohi na-aka mma

English: Don't put all your eggs in one basket
Yoruba: Má ṣe fi gbogbo ẹyin rẹ sínú agbọ̀n kan
Hausa: Kada ka zuba kwanakanka duka a kwando guda
Igbo: Atụla akwa gị niile n'otu nkata

English: Strike while the iron is hot
Yoruba: Lu irin nígbà tí ó bá ṣì gbóná
Hausa: Daki karfe tun yana da zafi
Igbo: Kụọ ígwè mgbe ọ nọ n'ọkụ

English: What doesn't kill you makes you stronger
Yoruba: Ìpọ́njú kì í pani, ó ń fúnni ní lágbára ni
Hausa: Wahala tana sa mutum ya kara ƙarfi
Igbo: Ihe na-egbughị mmadụ na-eme ya ike

English: All that glitters is not gold
Yoruba: Kì í ṣe gbogbo ohun tó ń dán ló jẹ́ wúrà
Hausa: Ba duka abin da yake kyalli bane zinariya
Igbo: Ọ bụghị ihe niile na-egbu maramara bụ ọlaedo

English: Knowledge is power
Yoruba: Ìmọ̀ ni agbára

English: No condition is permanent
Yoruba: Ayé ń yí, kò sí ohun tó dúró sójú kan
Igbo: Ọnọdụ ọ bụla anaghị adịru mgbe ebighị ebi

English: Actions speak louder than words
Yoruba: Ìṣe sọ̀rọ̀ ju ọ̀rọ̀ ẹnu lọ

English: It takes a village to raise a child
Yoruba: Gbogbo abúlé ni ó ń tọ́mọ
Hausa: Unguwa baki daya take renon yaro

English: Beauty is in the eye of the beholder
Yoruba: Ẹwà wà ní ojú ẹni tó ń wò ó
Igbo: Ịma mma dị n'anya onye na-ele anya

English: Better safe than sorry
Yoruba: Ìṣọ́ra sàn ju ìbámọ̀ lọ
Hausa: Gwara a yi a hankali da a yi nadama

English: First things first
Yoruba: Ìṣáájú ni a ń kọ́kọ́ ṣe

English: Practice makes perfect
Yoruba: Ìfara-mọ́ra ń mú ìjẹ́pípé wá
Hausa: Yawan maimaita aiki yana sa gwaninta
Igbo: Ịmụ n'oge na-eme ka mmadụ mara ihe

English: Time flies
Yoruba: Àkókò ń lọ

English: What is good for the goose is good for the gander
Yoruba: Ohun tó dára fún ọkùnrin, ó dára fún obìnrin
Hausa: Abin da ya dace da wani ya dace da kowa

English: Every cloud has a silver lining
Yoruba: Ìpọ́njú kò láìsì ìrètí

English: Givers never lack
Yoruba: Olùfúnni kì í ṣaláìní

English: Truth is bitter
Yoruba: Kaka kí òtítọ́ bàjẹ́, kí ilẹ̀ san

English: Curiosity killed the cat
Yoruba: Ìwádìí àṣejù ń mú ìjám̀bá wá
Igbo: Ịchọ ịmata ihe gabigara ókè na-eweta mbibi

English: Cut your coat according to your size
Yoruba: Wọ̀ ọ̀já rẹ gẹ́gẹ́ bí ara rẹ
Hausa: A yi abin da karfi zai iya
Igbo: Wepụta akwa gị dị ka ogo gị siri dị

English: The early bird catches the worm
Yoruba: Ẹni tó bá jí ní kùtùkùtù ní ń jẹun gbeṣẹ
Hausa: Wanda ya tashi da wuri shi zai samu
Igbo: Onye mbụ ruru ọmụmụ ga-enweta ihe

English: A good name is better than gold
Yoruba: Oruko rere san ju wúrà lọ

English: Less is more
Yoruba: Ohun tó kéré lè jẹ́ ohun ńlá
Hausa: Kadan ya fi yawa a wani lokacin
Igbo: Obere ihe nwere ike ịdị ukwuu

English: Silence is golden
Yoruba: Ìdákẹ́jẹ́ ni òògùn ọ̀rọ̀

English: Empty vessels make the most noise
Yoruba: Àpótí òfìfo ní ń dún kíkankíkan

English: Fortune favors the bold
Yoruba: Ìgboyà ni ó ń mú àṣeyọrí wá

English: Rome was not built in a day
Yoruba: Ìlú kan kì í dàgbà nímọ́jọ́ kan
Hausa: Ba a gina gari a rana daya ba
Igbo: A naghị arụ obodo n'otu ụbọchị

English: You can't judge a book by its cover
Yoruba: Má ṣe dá lẹ́jọ́ nípa ìrísí
Hausa: Ba a san na ciki ba sai an bude
Igbo: Atụla akwụkwọ ikpe site na mkpuchi ya

English: Never say never
Yoruba: Má ṣe sọ pé ó parí
Hausa: Kada ka ce ba zai yiwu ba

English: Two heads are better than one
Yoruba: Orí méjì sàn ju ẹyọ kan lọ
Hausa: Kai biyu ya fi guda daya
Igbo: Isi abụọ ka mma karịa otu

English: Cleanliness is next to godliness
Yoruba: Ìmọ́tótó ni òògùn àìsàn

English: Better late than never
Yoruba: Bí ó bá pẹ́, ó ṣì sàn ju kí ó má ṣẹlẹ̀ lọ
Hausa: Gwara a zo a makare da a ki zuwa
Igbo: Ịbịa n'oge na-adịghị mma ka mma karịa ịghara ịbịa

English: The end justifies the means
Yoruba: Àbájáde ni ó ń sọ bí iṣẹ́ ṣe rí
